overview:
Joe Jaudon developed the core technology for the Aventura Architecture. He is an expert in virtualization technologies and brings extensive experience in healthcare and healthcare IT infrastructure.

After an early career leading safaris in the Sahara Desert, Joe became the Desktop and Disaster Readiness Manager at Denver Health. He began to formulate the ideas behind Aventura when he saw that hospital desktop virtualization projects worked for IT but were forcing everyone else to work around the system. After six months of following doctors and nurses around the hospital, he figured out how to adapt the technology to the way doctors and nurses actually worked, instead of the other way around.
